front.title: Updates for the Back-to-back Frame Benchmark in RFC 2544

abstract.t: Fundamental Benchmarking Methodologies for Network Interconnect Devices of interest to the IETF are defined in RFC 2544. This memo updates the procedures of the test to measure the Back-to-back frames Benchmark of RFC 2544, based on further experience. This memo updates Section 26.4 of RFC 2544.
